attributes.action: New national anthem - Elgar's Pomp & Circumstance March No. 1 in D
attributes.additional_details: Stop using the dirge 'God Save the Queen' as our national anthem - replace it with Elgar's Pomp & Circumstance March No. 1 in D - which is rousing, patriotic, and would actually make people proud to be British. An added advantage is that it would also keep people awake !
